sentences.english: Shortcut menus are usually available by right-clicking the mouse.
sentences.chinese: 捷径功能表通常都可以按一下滑鼠右键取得。

sentences.english: Gets the current state of the left mouse button.
sentences.chinese: 取得滑鼠中键的目前状态。

sentences.english: A middle click always opens this message.
sentences.chinese: 滑鼠中键用于开启此讯息。

sentences.english: Please put the mouse on the photo to see the original painting.
sentences.chinese: 请把滑鼠放在图片上观看水彩画原作品。

sentences.english: We'll give you this mouse as a free gift.
sentences.chinese: 我们会给你这个滑鼠当作免费的礼物。

sentences.english: Move the mouse to the side, the camera moves laterally.
sentences.chinese: 向两侧移动滑鼠，相机会横向移动。

sentences.english: Turn the numeric keypad into a mouse control pad.
sentences.chinese: 使用数字键盘控制滑鼠。

sentences.english: Scrolls right within content after a user clicks the wheel button on a mouse.
sentences.chinese: 当使用者按一下滑鼠滚轮时，便在内容中向上卷动。

sentences.english: Right click the class to which you want to add a member function.
sentences.chinese: 在您要加入成员函式的类别上按一下滑鼠右键。

sentences.english: This is similar to how a selection made by a user using the mouse or keyboard behaves.
sentences.chinese: 类似于使用者如何使用滑鼠或键盘行为执行选择。

sentences.english: You can open a file by click on the mouse.
sentences.chinese: 用滑鼠点一下就可以打开档案。

sentences.english: Mouse capture is applied to a subtree of elements.
sentences.chinese: 滑鼠捕捉会套用至项目的树状子目录。

sentences.english: Move the mouse forward, the camera moves through the model.
sentences.chinese: 向前移动滑鼠，相机会在模型中移动。

sentences.english: Middle-click on the main icon opens the folder.
sentences.chinese: 对主图示点击滑鼠中键会开启该资料夹。

sentences.english: Set how much to scroll when the mouse wheel is rotated one notch.
sentences.chinese: 设定当滑鼠滚轮旋转一格时要卷动的行数。

definition: ballpoint pen/also written 圓珠筆|圆珠笔
USB flash drive (Tw)/see also 閃存盤|闪存盘[shan3 cun2 pan2]
